nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.formalisms

Class Resource<A extends java.lang.Comparable<A>,R extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<R>,T extends SimTime<A,R,T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.simulation.event.EventProducer
      • nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.formalisms.Resource<A,R,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - the absolute time type to use in timed events
    R - the relative time type
    T - the simulation time type to use.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, nl.tudelft.simulation.event.EventProducerInterface

    public class Resource<A extends java.lang.Comparable<A>,R extends java.lang.Number & java.lang.Comparable<R>,T extends SimTime<A,R,T>>
extends nl.tudelft.simulation.event.EventProducer
    A resource defines a shared and limited amount.

    (c) 2002-2018 Delft University of Technology , the Netherlands.
    See for project information www.simulation.tudelft.nl
    License of use: Lesser General Public License (LGPL) , no warranty.

    Since:
    1.5

    $Revision: 1.2 $ $Date: 2010/08/10 11:36:45 $
